Articles.Content:
Finally managed to get a low altitude cargo plane with 2 large and one huge cargo bay flyable while still being aesthetically pleasing,

presenting the Goliath hauler

![IEHpSOJ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/IEHpSOJ.jpg)

![LMd92rV.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/LMd92rV.jpg)

![7kuN6K9.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/7kuN6K9.jpg)

![hKyz7x1.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/hKyz7x1.jpg)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Y0UozK216m4?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Description:** 

When empty this plane is capable of 60m/s take off using only 2 engines and is very maneuverable for its size, SAS is not required for flight at any altitude if you do not want to be using it, The cargo limit is about as much as you think you can safely land without breaking the plane.

Easily adapted into a heavy carpet bomber if you so wish, Good luck and have fun.

Action groups: 

1 - Toggle inner 6 engines

2 - Toggle outer 4 engines

3 - Toggle small bay doors

4 - Toggle large bay doors

**Download link:** part count: 309

[http://www./download/mwqsibs9hrjl75p/Goliath+hauler.craft](http://www./download/mwqsibs9hrjl75p/Goliath+hauler.craft)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-16T02:41:35Z" title="04/16/2015 02:41  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 16, 2015</time> by Roflcopterkklol**

Nice, i wont be able to run it unfortunately at 309m parts, i can see people using it to build polar bases.
